response.overview: Catherine, a novelist with an insatiable sexual appetite, becomes a prime suspect when her boyfriend is brutally murdered -- a crime she had described in her latest story.
response.tagline: A brutal murder. A brilliant killer. A cop who can't resist the danger.
response.title: Basic Instinct
